name: somnium (lunacria)
description:
a game where you play as a kid who helps people in their dreams. that's about it really

It's pretty short like 15 minutes maybe??? yeah

This is my first time making a game .. so please don't judge it too much haha...

this was made for My First Game Jam (although i didn't actually get it submitted in the time frame because i had a little panic at the end)

if you find any bugs please tell me, there's probably a lot

there's also no music, i might? add some later but i'm awful at music..

update 1/19 - fixed some sprites + text
